welcome_message_body: Welcome to George Town, Malaysia! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's UNESCO World Heritage charm, vibrant street art, and mouthwatering local cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Bread & Chocolate
restaurants.description: Bread & Chocolate is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Brasserie Restaurant
restaurants.description: Brasserie Restaurant is a caribbean restaurant located in Grand Cayman.
restaurants.address: Cricket Square, George Town (Cricket Square), Cayman Islands

restaurants.name: South West Collective
restaurants.description: South West Collective is a salad restaurant located in George Town.

restaurants.name: Hard Rock Cafe Cayman Islands
restaurants.description: Hard Rock Cafe Cayman Islands is a theme restaurant located in George Town.

restaurants.name: Cayman Creperie
restaurants.description: Cayman Creperie is a creperie located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butterworth Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Butterworth Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Penang International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Low Cost Carrier Terminal
terminals.description: The Low Cost Carrier Terminal at Penang International Airport caters to budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
